"The vulnerabilities, reported Tuesday by researchers from security firm Nozomi,
reside in the Bosch Rexroth Handheld Nutrunner NXA015S-36V-B." ---- Steve Yates
ITS, Inc. --
Link: None

metadata.subject: [patchmanagement] Patch your wrenches
